page.title: 04Education
page.content: Dunston has a modern primary school built just over ten years ago.The age range is from 4 to 11.There are 3 teachers, a caretaker, 2 dinner ladies and a secretary . At the present time there are 67 children in school. Nocton is an old school, built last century.The number have slumped due to the closure of RAF Nocton Hall. At present there are 20 children and 2 teachers. All children at the age of 11 transfer to Branston School and Community College. The children are taken by coach each day on a four mile journey. There are 1300 pupils at Branston. The school offers a wide range of subjects. There is a youth wing and many courses take place during the evening.
